<MethodEndpoint

Sets a notification status for a room with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"roomsId":{"description":"Room ID","nullable":true,"example":{"int":1234,"string":"some text","boolean":true}},"mute":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if the room notifications are disabled or not","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Request parameters for the room notification settings","title":"ASC.Web.Api.ApiModels.RequestsDto.RoomsNotificationsSettingsRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
